provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as &e Foreign Mes Corporation (Ex-
emption from Filing Accounts and Declaration of Assets) Order. 1984.
Assets) Order. 1984.
   2 It is hereiby declared that for the Wer carrying out of the puqmsts
of this Act, a Foreign Sales Corporation shall be exempt from the obU-
gations imposed by section 123 (3), 124 and 1 2 4 ~of the Companies Act.
